messages.content: Chris Coleman, the Liberal Democrat candidate to be our next MP, has set out his contract with local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and the abolition of unfair university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

mentions.partyLeader: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable are backing Chris Coleman to win here.
mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s so close! Local election results from 2009 show that the Lib Dems can win here!

issues.education: A fair chance for every child. Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and the abolition of unfair university tuition fees.
issues.environment: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener. Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.
issues.governance: A fair deal for you from the politicians. Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services.
issues.socialWelfare: We will cut more dope on patronage, restore the pensions' earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces.

leaflet.personalStatement: If I am elected as your next Member of Parliament, I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns and stand up for our community.

endorsements.endorsement: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable are backing Chris Coleman to win here.

quotes.text: For too long now, New Labour and the Tories have taken this area for granted. But I want to change all of that - I want to put the Forest of Dean and West Gloucestershire first.

images.caption: Chris Coleman will be the change that we need
Local election results from 2009 show that the Lib Dems can win here!
At this election, vote for change that works for you...
